attributes.action: Rescind forthwith the proposed tax on telephone lines to pay for upgrading broadband
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The undersigned demand that the introduction of new taxation allegedly to be used to improve broadband access in the UK be stopped. The use of taxation powers in such a manner is unacceptable, is against natural justice, and is discriminatory. The government should instead encourage by whatever means at its disposal - for instance by means of grants, corporation tax discounts or rebates - those private companies which provide such services to improve their offerings across the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
